title: ISic020319. ISic020319
body:
1ΑΤΑΙΤΥΚΑΙ ε̄̓μὶ

1ataitykai emi

1ΑΤΑΙΤΥΚΑΙΕ̄ΜΙ

1ATAITYKAIEMI

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Agostiniani 1977 (IAS I)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

Most scholars agree with the division of the text into αταιτυκαι and εμι, in which εμι would have the value of 'I am' and the second term would be an onomastic formula. Agostiniani (1977) hypothesises that this second part of the inscription could be a bimember onomastic formula (αται τυκαι), while Ferri (1968) identifies in the first part of the inscription the name Ατος, attested in Selinunte.

bibliography

  • Agostiniani 1977 319 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002201
  • Lejeune 1970 181 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001880
  • Tusa 1970 248 no.131, tav.LXV https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002567
  • Ambrosini 1968 171 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002189
  • Ferri 1968 267-268 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002573
  • Greco 1993 201 fig.6 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002575
